org.apache.poi.hwpf

Class HWPFDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.POIDocument
      • org.apache.poi.hwpf.HWPFDocumentCore
        • org.apache.poi.hwpf.HWPFDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class HWPFDocument
extends HWPFDocumentCore
    This class acts as the bucket that we throw all of the Word data structures into.(这个类充当我们将所有Word数据结构放入其中的桶。)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.poi.hwpf.HWPFDocumentCore

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HWPFDocument(DirectoryNode directory)
      This constructor loads a Word document from a specific point in a POIFSFileSystem, probably not the default.(此构造函数从POIFSFileSystem中的特定点加载Word文档，可能不是默认值。)
      HWPFDocument(java.io.InputStream istream)
      This constructor loads a Word document from an InputStream.(此构造函数从InputStream加载Word文档。)
      HWPFDocument(POIFSFileSystem pfilesystem)
      This constructor loads a Word document from a POIFSFileSystem(此构造函数从POIFSFilesSystem加载Word文档)

        public HWPFDocument(java.io.InputStream istream)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor loads a Word document from an InputStream.(此构造函数从InputStream加载Word文档。)
        Parameters:
        istream - The InputStream that contains the Word document.(istream -包含Word文档的InputStream。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an unexpected IOException from the passed in InputStream.(java.io. IOResponse-如果InputStream中传递的内容出现意外的IOResponse。)

      • HWPFDocument

        public HWPFDocument(DirectoryNode directory)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor loads a Word document from a specific point in a POIFSFileSystem, probably not the default. Used typically to open embeded documents.(此构造函数从POIFSFileSystem中的特定点加载Word文档，可能不是默认值。通常用于打开嵌入的文档。)
        Parameters:
        directory - The DirectoryNode that contains the Word document.(目录-包含Word文档的Directory节点。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an unexpected IOException from the passed in POIFSFileSystem.(IOException -如果POIFSFileSystem中传递了一个意外的IOException。)

      • getHeaderStoryRange

        public Range getHeaderStoryRange()
        Returns the range which covers all "Header Stories". A header story contains a header, footer, end note separators and footnote separators.(返回涵盖所有“标题故事”的范围。标题故事包含标题、页脚、尾注分隔符和脚注分隔符。)

      • write

        public void write()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Write out the word file that is represented by this class, to the currently open File, via the writeable POIFSFileSystem it was opened as.

        This will fail (with an IllegalStateException if the Document was opened read-only, opened from an InputStream instead of a File, or if this is not the root document. For those cases, you must use write(OutputStream) or write(File) to write to a brand new document.

        (通过打开该文件的可写POIFSFileSystem，将此类表示的word文件写入当前打开的文件中。这将失败（如果文档是只读打开的、从InputStream而不是File打开的，或者这不是根文档，则会出现IllegalStateResponse。对于这些情况，您必须使用writing（OutputStream）或writing（File）来写入全新文档。)
        Specified by:
        write in class POIDocument(在课堂上写POIDOSYS)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown on errors writing to the file(java.io. IOResponse-写入文件时发生错误时引发)
        Since:
        3.15

      • write

        public void write(java.io.File newFile)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes out the word file that is represented by an instance of this class.

        If the File exists, it will be replaced, otherwise a new one will be created

        (写出由此类的实例表示的word文件。如果该文件存在，将被替换，否则将创建新文件)
        Specified by:
        write in class POIDocument(在课堂上写POIDOSYS)
        Parameters:
        newFile - The File to write to.(newFile -要写入的文件。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an unexpected IOException from writing to the File.(java.io. IOResponse-如果写入文件时出现意外的IOResponse。)
        Since:
        3.15 beta 3

      • write

        public void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes out the word file that is represented by an instance of this class.

        For better performance when writing to files, use write(File). If stream has a high cost/latency associated with each written byte, consider wrapping the OutputStream in a BufferedOutputStream to improve write performance.

        (写出由此类的实例表示的word文件。为了在写入文件时获得更好的性能，请使用writer（File）。如果流具有与每个写入字节相关的高成本/延迟，请考虑将OutputStream包装在BufferedOutputStream中以提高写入性能。)
        Specified by:
        write in class POIDocument(在课堂上写POIDOSYS)
        Parameters:
        out - The OutputStream to write to.(out -要写入的OutputStream。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an unexpected IOException from the passed in OutputStream.(java.io. IOResponse-如果OutputStream中传递的内容出现意外的IOResponse。)
